summary: This bill, the "Public and Private Sector Ransomware Response Coordination Act of 2025," directs the Secretary of the Treasury to issue a report on the coordination between public and private sectors in responding to ransomware attacks on financial institutions. The report will analyze current collaboration, information sharing, and the utility of reported information, as well as recommend policy initiatives to improve response times and public-private partnerships. The Secretary will also brief congressional committees on the report's findings.
